General.Name: Innuovo Technology Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Innuovo Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research and development, production, and sale of rare earth permanent magnet materials in China. The company was formerly known as Taiyuan Shuangta Ganyu Co., Ltd. Innuovo Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Jinhua, China.
